segments.text: I see the girl standing there with her hand out, just waiting for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s the smarter one, not climbing on anything dangerous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s watching the boy like he’s some kind of hero for reaching the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice she’s not even looking at her mom, who’s right there drying dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if she’s ever been caught doing this before.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is getting closer to her feet, and she doesn’t even seem to care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think she’s more focused on the cookies than the mess happening around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is taking forever, and she’s just standing there like it’s normal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she at least warns him before he falls.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so chaotic, but she’s just calmly waiting for her treat.
segments.speaker: PAR
